name: Clash of Mushroom
description:
"Clash of Mushroom" is a casual mobile game with mushrooms as the protagonist, players control the army of mushrooms to attack and defend.You need to send your mushroom warriors to capture the castle, and after passing through countless levels, gain control of all areas; there are many battles in the game, and only the mushrooms who survive to the end are the real winners.
[Game Introduction]
Command your mushroom team to fight here, and try different ways to pass the level; different heroes can improve the player's combat effectiveness, and finally pass the level more easily; the game contains a wealth of ways to pass the level, and winning in the game will bring the player Come to rich rewards, and at the same time can unlock more props; the development outside the game can quickly improve your strength and make it easier to deal with the following levels;

[Game Features]
Cute cartoon-style game screen and excellent game sound design, giving players a super comfortable game experience.
Try using different game skills to fight here with your mushroom army, and occupy the enemy's base faster.
Interesting and fun Casual challenges, cute character design, comfortable and decompressed challenge levels
[Game Highlights] Easy and casual game challenges, easy to get started, and rich in the latest levels
Experience some interesting level challenges, different heroes give you different game experience
A large number of cute classic characters, fast-paced battles, and various super skills for you to choose
